headline: ESAB’s Ruffian Launch With Linde Tests Growth And Margin Potential
summary: ESAB (NYSE:ESAB) introduced its new Ruffian EMP 270G engine-driven welding generator at CONEXPO-CON/AGG 2026. The product is being launched in partnership with Linde, focusing on professional welding and cutting users. The company positions the Ruffian EMP 270G as a response to customer feedback and current jobsite needs. ESAB, known for its welding and cutting equipment, is adding the Ruffian EMP 270G to its portfolio at a time when customers are looking for more capable and efficient...
